item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>@3, Andrew, I probably should have posted my travel plans in detail shouldn't I. I'm in DFW right now (11:45) but only for another 30 minutes and then I'm off again. Just time to log on, replicate my mail file and blog and get off again! Apologies for that. Maybe next time I'm flying through we can meet up.</p><p>Matt</p>
item.content:encoded:
@3, Andrew, I probably should have posted my travel plans in detail shouldn’t I. I’m in DFW right now (11:45) but only for another 30 minutes and then I’m off again. Just time to log on, replicate my mail file and blog and get off again! Apologies for that. Maybe next time I’m flying through we can meet up.

Matt

item.title: By: Ed Brill
item.dc:creator: Ed Brill
item.description: <p>sounds like my kind of flight. I flew ORD-Stansted back in 1992 when the UK was trying to establish Stansted as a mainline int'l airport...flew American Airlines actually. I don't think it lasted long.<br/><br/>Anyway, in some ways this sounds like the Privatair operation between ORD and Dusseldorf...a flight I've truly enjoyed thrice.</p>
item.content:encoded:
sounds like my kind of flight. I flew ORD-Stansted back in 1992 when the UK was trying to establish Stansted as a mainline int’l airport…flew American Airlines actually. I don’t think it lasted long.

Anyway, in some ways this sounds like the Privatair operation between ORD and Dusseldorf…a flight I’ve truly enjoyed thrice.

item.title: By: Andrew Kelly
item.dc:creator: Andrew Kelly
item.description: <p>Matt - when and how long is your layover at DFW? I'd like to pop over and buy you a beer for the road (literally)!!</p>
item.content:encoded: Matt – when and how long is your layover at DFW? I’d like to pop over and buy you a beer for the road (literally)!!

item.content:encoded: Enjoy the trip. Remember to drive on the right http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLS/$FILE/biggrin.gif“> Rob

item.title: By: Simon
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description: <p>Have a great journey, Matthew! We'll be following your posts will no small amount of jealousy!!!</p>
item.content:encoded: Have a great journey, Matthew! We’ll be following your posts will no small amount of jealousy!!!
